name: Suite
tagline-description: Comfort meets simplicity. Our Standard Room offers everything you need for a peaceful stay — clean, cozy, and budget-friendly without compromising quality.

name: Executive Suite
tagline: Luxury, Privacy, and Peace of Mind - All in One
tagline-description: A step up in space and style. The Deluxe Room gives you extra comfort, elegant furnishing, and a relaxed ambiance for both work and rest.

name: Standard
tagline: Everything You Need for a Peaceful Night’s Rest
tagline-description: Designed for travelers who love a little more room. The Luxury Double features spacious bedding, refined decor, and the perfect atmosphere for couples or solo guests wanting extra comfort.

name: Luxury Double
tagline: Spacious Comfort for Two, or Just for You
tagline-description: Experience more than a room — enjoy a private suite that offers a living area, elegant furnishings, and an elevated sense of space and privacy for extended stays or special visits.

name: Deluxe
tagline: Designed for Comfort, Styled for Ease
tagline-description: Our finest offering. The Executive Suite is tailored for distinguished guests who desire luxury, tranquility, and class — complete with a separate lounge, refined décor, and top-tier amenities.

name: Deluxe
tagline: Designed for Comfort, Styled for Ease
tagline-description: Our finest offering. The Executive Suite is tailored for distinguished guests who desire luxury, tranquility, and class — complete with a separate lounge, refined décor, and top-tier amenities.

name: Computer Center
tagline-description: Our fully equipped ICT Centre is designed for training, workshops, and research. Whether you're hosting a digital skills seminar or facilitating online courses, our 50-capacity tech-friendly hall offers fast internet, modern systems, and a conducive learning environment.

name: Event Hall
tagline: Where Every Event Finds its Perfect Stage
tagline-description: Our 300-seater Event Hall and beautiful open-air reception space provide the ideal backdrop. With reliable power, serene surroundings, and flexible seating arrangements

name: Restaurant
tagline-description: Our in-house restaurant offers delicious, freshly prepared meals — from local favorites to continental classics.
